detaileddescription.para: When setting all to broadcast or unknown multicast flood, it also includes flooding to the router. When setting all to unknown unicast flood, it does not include flooding to the router
Disable flooding
Flood on the L2MC group

briefdescription.para: Flood on all vlan members and L2MC group.

detaileddescription.para: Flood on all vlan members, without the router In addition, flood on the supplied L2MC group

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for unknown unicast, unknown multicast and broadcast flood controls.
List of vlan members in a VLAN.
Maximum number of learned MAC addresses.

detaileddescription.para: Zero means learning limit is disabled.

briefdescription.para: STP Instance that the VLAN is associated to.

detaileddescription.para: Default to default STP instance id

briefdescription.para: To disable learning on a VLAN.

detaileddescription.para: This should override port learn settings. If this is set to true on a vlan, then the source MAC learning is disabled for this vlan on a member port even if learn is enable on the port (based on port learn attribute).

briefdescription.para: To set IPv4 multicast lookup key on a VLAN.
To set IPv6 multicast lookup key on a VLAN.
L2MC Group ID that unknown non-IP mcast packets forwarded to.

detaileddescription.para: Indicating the output ports/LAGs for unknown non-IP multicast packets. This attribute only takes effect when one of the following conditions is met: (1) non-IP multicast packet (2) IPv4 multicast packet && not linklocal && IPv4 mcast snooping disabled for vlan (3) IPv6 multicast packet && not linklocal && IPv6 mcast snooping disabled for vlan In case of SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, unknown multicast packets will be discarded. If the group has no member, unknown multicast packets will be discarded.

briefdescription.para: L2MC Group ID that unknown IPv4 mcast packets forwarded to.

detaileddescription.para: Indicating the output ports/LAGs for unknown IPv4 multicast packets. This attribute only takes effect when the following condition is met: (1) IPv4 multicast packet && not linklocal && IPv4 mcast snooping enabled for vlan In case of SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, unknown multicast packets will be discarded. If the group has no member, unknown multicast packets will be discarded.

briefdescription.para: L2MC Group ID that unknown IPv6 mcast packets forwarded to.

detaileddescription.para: Indicating the output ports/LAGs for unknown IPv6 multicast packets. This attribute only takes effect when the following condition is met: (1) IPv6 multicast packet && not linklocal && IPv6 mcast snooping enabled for vlan In case of SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, unknown multicast packets will be discarded. If the group has no member, unknown multicast packets will be discarded.

briefdescription.para: L2MC Group ID that unknown linklocal mcast packets forwarded to.

detaileddescription.para: Indicating the output ports/LAGs for unknown linklocal multicast packets. This attribute only takes effect when the following condition is met: (1) IPv4 multicast packet && linklocal address && IPv4 mcast snooping enabled for vlan (2) IPv6 multicast packet && linklocal address && IPv6 mcast snooping enabled for vlan In case of SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, unknown multicast packets will be discarded. If the group has no member, unknown multicast packets will be discarded.

briefdescription.para: VLAN bind point for ingress ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an ingress ACL table or ACL group on a VLAN. Enable/Update ingress ACL table or ACL group filtering by assigning the list of valid object id. Disable ingress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: VLAN bind point for egress ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an egress ACL table or ACL group on a VLAN. Enable/Update egress ACL table or ACL group filtering by assigning the list of valid object id. Disable egress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.
Value Range SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_VLAN_USER_META_DATA_RANGE

Provides control on the set of vlan members on which unknown unicast packets need to be flooded. This attribute would be used only when the SAI_VLAN_ATTR_UNKNOWN_UNICAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE is set as SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_L2MC_GROUP. When this attribute's value is SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, then flooding would be disabled.

Provides control on the set of vlan members on which unknown multicast packets need to be flooded. This attribute would be used only when the SAI_VLAN_ATTR_UNKNOWN_MULTICAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE is set as SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_L2MC_GROUP.When this attribute's value is SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, then flooding would be disabled.

Provides control on the set of vlan members on which broadcast packets need to be flooded. This attribute would be used only when the SAI_VLAN_ATTR_BROADCAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE is set as SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_L2MC_GROUP.When this attribute's value is SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, then flooding would be disabled.

briefdescription.para: IGMP Snooping enable or disable control for VLAN.

detaileddescription.para: IGMP Snooping enable control for VLAN. Default is disabled

briefdescription.para: Vlan bind point for TAM object.

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base

briefdescription.para: Attribute Id in sai_set_vlan_attribute() and sai_get_vlan_attribute() calls.

detaileddescription.para: Valid only for .1Q bridge ports.
Custom range base value
End of custom range base

briefdescription.para: VLAN counter IDs in sai_get_vlan_stats() call.
Attribute data for unknown unicast, unknown multicast and broadcast flood controls.
Attribute Id in sai_set_vlan_attribute() and sai_get_vlan_attribute() calls.
VLAN counter IDs in sai_get_vlan_stats() call.
